title: Discard
content:
Place discarded cards in their corresponding discard pile and discarded tokens in the supply. Effects that trigger when a card clears do not trigger when a card is discarded.

  • When a card is discarded, all cards attached to it and tokens on it are also discarded.
  • If a mission card would be discarded, return it to the surroundings (or wherever it would be placed at the beginning of a day).

Note: Abilities that are are triggered by choosing to discard a card can only be used at a specific timing
